author: missirol
body:
#### PR description:

Resolves #35453

* enforce not having multiple bins with the same label in some of the DQM outputs of `HLTFiltersDQMonitor` (this can happen when the same module appears multiple times in a Path)

* also, fixed the default value of an InputTag in `HLTFiltersDQMonitor::fillDescriptions`

#### PR validation:

Private checks.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A
title: enforce bins with unique labels in HLTFiltersDQMonitor
